column4: looks like you will have to compile from source and make the .deb yourself - even intrepid only has 11.5
so much work though to get all hte plugins and what not working correctly and i'm lazy...  ;)
well, it doesn't appear that anyone has compiled it and made .debs available, i did look on PPA and intrepid - and it's only 5 minutes work :) go on, contribute to ubuntu :)
i could compile it... but i can't package things.  I've read tutorials.  I've looked at daniel holbach's video cast, but I just can't do it
